alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Lawrence County through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over De Kalb, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Kalb, Heuvelton, Richville, Rensselaer Falls, De Peyster and East De Kalb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
